item.description: App Insights Links Add App Insights to Angular SPA Application Insights to JavaScript Add App Insights to Angular ..different take Add App Insights to Angular yet another way Got it working this way Notes ‘Workspace Based’ requires log analytics workspace Buffers user sessions so data not sent back to MS until page is closed Can use trace and log analytics Angular Single Page App (SPA) Notes Add instrumentation key to environments constants
